events.name: Imagine Cup & Windows 8 @ Stevens Institute of Technology Workshop / Hackathon
events.about:
Imagine Cup 2013 is coming to Stevens Institute of Technology! 

Imagine Cup 2013 is going to be in Russia! To get you up and running Microsoft is coming to your school for a two day Workshop and hackathon.

Workshop will consist of a few sessions from basic to intermidate level of tech talks, then a hands on labs. Throughout the workshop there you will have the guidance from Microsoft Techincal Evangelist Maria Naggaga and Rachel Appel.

The hackathon will begin after the presentations on Friday and go all night till 5 PM the next day. Please be prepaired to Demo your teams app for a chance to win a prize.

Sesion 1 Will Attempt to Cover

Starts 7PM - 10 PM

  • Introduction to Imagine Cup and Windows 8 development.

  • Builidng in Windows 8 App with Visual Studio 2012

  • Getting Started with Sample Codes

  • Buidling a team

  • Students will split into to groups of four and work on building their Imagine cup project.

  • Let the hacking begin!

Session 2 Lets get to coding and Prizes

Starts at 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM  

  • Students will split into to groups and work on building projects Imagine cup.
  • Techincal Evangelist will be available to take questions and give guidance. 
  • Prizes!!!

Prerequisites

  • You!
  • Bring your laptop or have a lab machine running Windows 8 or Mac running Windows on VM.
  • Signup for DreamSpark
  • Install Windows 8
  • Install Visual Studio 2012

Ongoing Microsoft Challenges and Opportunities

Take the WIndows 8 Student App Holiday Challenge and stand a chance to win $100 gift card. Note the application deadline is January 20.

For the young entrepenuer, please register for the Imagine Accelerator by January 6th. Please read my blog for more information. Note this is different from the regular Imagine Cup competiton with a March 2013application deadline.
